1.content:
Its been a few days since Tatsuya came back from London to see Maria while she was visiting her family. Since then he's been spending time with Lisa's family while Maria was gone. During that time he went to the summer festival with Lisa, been helping Meg with her studies for her exam and even met their mom Naomi.
There was also a bit of sex time with Lisa and Meg. A few days later Maria and her mom have returned from London as well and things are about to get lively. The next morning Tatsuya woke up in a good mood.

"I wonder who I'm going to hang out with today?" He said to himself.

111.content:
Tatsuya decided that he'd hangout with Maria today. He felt like he hasn't been spending a lot of time with her, since he was hanging with the rest of Maria's family while he was in London and when he got back he spent time Lisa and her family. 112.content:
Tatsuya was going over to Maria's house to see if she wanted to do anything today. When he got there he knocked on the door and the one who opened was Maria's mom Cecilia Misono.

"Hi mom, is Maria here?" Tatsuya asked.

"Sorry Tatsuya, Maria is running some errands for me so she won't be back for a while." Cecilia replied. "But do you want to come in I'll make some tea?"

"Sure." Tatsuya replied back. Then Tatsuya entered the house and Cecilia made some herbal tea for the two of them.

"So mom I was planning on doing some things with Maria today,but since she's not here maybe you could come with me instead." Tatsuya asked after drinking some tea. "So what do you say?"

"I don't know Tatsuya, I was planning on doing some chores around the house." Cecilia said hesitantly.

"Please mom." Tatsuya again.

"Alright Tatsuya I guess I can do them later." Cecilia said with a smile on her face.

"Thanks mom, so what do you want to do." Tatsuya said while looking at with curiosity.
112.title: Cecilia Misono

113.content:
"I wonder what Maria's doing today?" Tatsuya asked himself. Maria has been busy for the past few day and he was wondering if she could something with him today. After a short walk he made it to Maria's house and then rang the door bell. After a few minutes of waiting the door opened and much to Tatsuya's surprise the girl standing in the doorway was Maria's older cousin Claire Fairchild.

"Hi Tatsuya." Claire said happily while hugging him.

"Claire what are you doing here in Japan?" Tatsuya said in shock.

"Mom said it was okay if I could stay here for a while." Claire explained. "That way I can visit with Maria and aunt Cecilia, do some sight seeing, but most importantly I can spend time with you Tatsuya."

"Is your little brother okay with this?" Tatsuya asked.

"Well Anthony was a little bit upset at first but then he got over it." Clarie said in a reassuring voice

"Well I was planning seeing if Maria could do something with me today, but do you want go do something Claire?" Tatsuya asked.

"Of course Tatsuya." Claire replied with enthusiasm.

"Well what do you want to do Claire?" Tatsuya asked again.
113.title: Claire Florence Fairchild

114.content:

"I wonder what kind of chores does mom want me to do?" Tatsuya said to himself. After a short walk he arrived at the house and knocked on the door, only to see that the person who opened the door was cecilia's older sister Sarah Fairchild.

"Hello Tatsuya." Sarah said with grin on her face.

"Sarah what are you doing her?" Tatsuya asked.

"Well you and my sister's family came to see us, so me and Claire came to see my sister and you."

"Is Anthony here as well." He asked.

"No, he's got a big soccer tournament coming up and couldn't come with us." She replied.

"Then where are Maria and the others?"

"Cecilia and Maria went to a women's clothing store to Maria some new bras and Cecilia insisted that Clarie should go with them." Sarah said. "So until then its just the two of us."

"Well mom asked me to do some chores around the house, do you want to help?" He asked.

121.content:
Tatsuya decided that he'd hang out with Lisa today. Since Maria told that she and her mom had a spa day today and that they wouldn't be back until the evening.

"I wonder what Lisa's doing today?" Tatsuya said to himself. While on the way to Lisa's house he saw Lisa lounging on the porch in her backyard. So Tatsuya opened the gate to the backyard and met up with Lisa.

"Hey Lisa." Tatsuya said.

"Hi Tatsuya, what brings you her." Lisa replied.

"You want to go do something today?" He asked.

"Well Meg is at a friend's house and my mom is doing some errands, so sure I'll do something with you." She replied. "Is Maria coming with us?"

"No she and mom are at the spa so its just the two of us."

"Alright it'll be nice for us to do something without Maria, it might make her feel a little jealous." She said.

"I doubt it Lisa." Tatsuya said. "So where do you want to go?"
121.title: Lisa Mizuno

122.content:
"Hi onii-chan." Meg said happily.

"HI Meg." Tatsuya replied. Since Lisa called yesterday saying that Meg needed some extra help with her studies, Tatsuya's been helping her little sister for the past few days. Meg doesn't mind it as she gets to be Tatsuya most of the time. Tatsuya doesn't mind it either as he gets more friendly with her family.

"So Meg what do you want do over math, science, history?" He asked.

"Actually onii-chan I just finished reviewing history, so I'd to go over health today." Meg said. "But I finished right before you got here so I might want to take a break soon." "Besides onii-chan we already did math and science yesterday."

"That's okay, but you know there's no such thing as too much studying." Tatsuya stated.

"I know that, but all work and no play makes jack a dull boy." Meg stated back.

"I'm familiar with the saying Meg so what do you want to do, continue studying or take a break?" Tatsuya asked.

123.content:
"*Knock* *knock* Lisa are you home." Tatsuya said from behind the door of her house. After a few minutes of waiting he started to hear footsteps heading towards the door. He stepped back a little and saw that the person opening the door was none other than Lias's mom.

"Hello Tatsuya." She said.

"Hi Mrs. Mizuno, is Lisa here?" Tatsuya asked.

"No she's at a lacrosse game today and Meg is over at a friend's house so its just me." She replied. "Do you want to come in?"

"Sure." He said happily. With that Tatsuya came in the house and Mrs. Mizuno made some snacks for the two of them.

"Thanks Mrs. Mizuno." Tatsuya said.

"Oh you don't need to be so formal just call me Naomi." She said.

"Okay Naomi-san." He replied. "So did you have any plans for the day?"

"I was planning on running some errands and do some chores around the house why?" Naomi asked.

"Mind if I help you with some of those things?"

"Not at all, in fact it'll be nice to have a man helping me out since my husband always works so late." She said.

"Great so what should we do first?"
123.title: Naomi Mizuno
